text: Capturing moments that will last a lifetime.
author: null

text: A photograph is a pause button for life.
author: null

text: The best things in life are the people we love, the places we've been, and the memories we've made along the way.
author: null

text: A picture is worth a thousand words.
author: Frederick R. Barnard

text: Life is like a camera: focus on the good times, develop from the negatives, and if things don't work out, take another shot.
author: null

text: Photography is the story I fail to put into words.
author: Destin Sparks

text: Sometimes I arrive just when God's ready to have someone click the shutter.
author: Ansel Adams

text: Photography is a love affair with life.
author: Burk Uzzle

text: Photography is the beauty of life captured.
author: Tara Chisholm

text: Taking pictures is like tiptoeing into the kitchen late at night and stealing Oreo cookies.
author: Diane Arbus

text: A camera is a tool for learning how to see without a camera.
author: Dorothea Lange

text: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
author: Ansel Adams

text: Photography is the only language that can be understood anywhere in the world.
author: Bruno Barbey

text: The camera sees more than the eye, so why not make use of it?
author: Edward Weston

text: Photography is the art of observation. It has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
author: Elliott Erwitt

text: When words become unclear, I shall focus with photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence.
author: Ansel Adams

text: The camera makes you forget you're there. It's not like you are hiding but you forget, you are just looking so much.
author: Annie Leibovitz

text: To me, photography is the art of frozen time… the ability to store emotion and feelings within a frame.
author: Meshack Otieno

text: Great photography is about depth of feeling, not depth of field.
author: Peter Adams

text: The eye should learn to listen before it looks.
author: Robert Frank

text: Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever… It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.
author: Aaron Siskind

text: I really believe there are things nobody would see if I didn't photograph them.
author: Diane Arbus

text: Photography is the only spontaneous art that has survived technological progress.
author: Marcello Mastroianni

text: Your first 10,000 photographs are your worst.
author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

text: Photography is a love affair with life.
author: Burk Uzzle

text: A good snapshot keeps a moment from running away.
author: Eudora Welty

text: There are no rules for good photographs, there are only good photographs.
author: Ansel Adams

text: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever… It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.
author: Aaron Siskind

text: When you photograph people in color, you photograph their clothes. But when you photograph people in Black and white, you photograph their souls.
author: Ted Grant

text: Photography is the art of frozen time… the ability to store emotion and feelings within a frame.
author: Meshack Otieno

text: Capturing moments, creating memories
author: Null

text: Photography is the art of observation
author: Elliot Erwitt

text: A picture is worth a thousand words
author: Null

text: Life is like a camera, focus on the good times
author: Null

text: Photography is a love affair with life
author: Burk Uzzle

text: Through my lens, I see beauty everywhere
author: Null

text: Photography is the story I fail to put into words
author: Destin Sparks

text: Every picture tells a story
author: Null

text: Capture the moment, share the love
author: Null

text: A photograph is a secret about a secret. The more it tells you, the less you know
author: Diane Arbus

text: My camera is my passport
author: Null

text: The best thing about a picture is that it never changes, even when the people in it do
author: Andy Warhol

text: In photography, there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality
author: Alfred Stieglitz

text: Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving
author: Aaron Siskind

text: Every day is a new opportunity to capture something amazing
author: Null

text: Life is short, capture the moments that matter
author: Null

text: Photography is an art of observation. It has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them
author: Elliott Erwitt

text: I don't take photographs, I make them
author: Minor White

text: Beauty can be seen in all things, seeing and composing the beauty is what separates the snapshot from the photograph
author: Matt Hardy

text: There are always two people in every picture: the photographer and the viewer
author: Ansel Adams

text: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still
author: Dorothea Lange

text: A camera is a save button for the mind's eye
author: Roger Kingston

text: Photography is a way to capture a moment in time and make it immortal
author: Null

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle
author: Steve Jobs

text: Creativity is contagious, pass it on
author: Albert Einstein

text: Be the reason someone smiles today, share your photos
author: Null

text: The camera is an instrument that teaches people how to see without a camera
author: Dorothea Lange

text: Sometimes I do get to places just when God's ready to have somebody click the shutter
author: Ansel Adams

text: A great photograph is one that fully expresses what one feels, in the deepest sense, about what is being photographed
author: Ansel Adams

text: Photography is the only language that can be understood anywhere in the world
author: Bruno Barbey

text: Life is beautiful, capture it with a camera
author: Null
